{
  "@context": "http://schema.org",
  "@type": "WebSite",
  "name": "",
  "alternateName": "",
  "url": ""}





/*
Template Name 	: Spemer
Tempalte By 	: https://github.com/spemer/spemer_portfolio
*/
/* ==========================================================================
VARIABLE DEV
============================================================================= 
<Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#093e84" value="#093e84"/>

<Group description="Body" selector="body">
<Variable name="body.background.color" description="body.background.color" type="color" default="#093e84" value="#093e84"/>
</Group>
<Variable name="body.background" description="body.background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none no-repeat fixed center center" value="$(color) none no-repeat fixed center center"/>	

<Group description="text.color" selector="body">
<Variable name="body.text.color" description="body.text.color" type="color" default="#000" value="#000000"/>
</Group>

<Group description="link.color" selector="body">
<Variable name="link.color" description="link.color" type="color" default="#4285f4" value="#4285f4"/>
<Variable name="link.color.hover" description="link.color.hover" type="color" default="#111" value="#111111"/>
<Variable name="link.color.visited" description="link.color.visited" type="color" default="#6d1dec" value="#6d1dec"/>
</Group>
========================================================================== */
@charset "UTF-8";@import "https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Merriweather:400|Roboto+Slab";@import "https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css";
@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){.featherlight .featherlight-content{margin-left:0;margin-right:0;max-height:98%;padding:0;border-bottom:none}}@media all{html.with-featherlight{overflow:hidden}.featherlight{display:none;position:fixed;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;z-index:2147483647;text-align:center;white-space:nowrap;cursor:-moz-zoom-out;cursor:zoom-out;-webkit-cursor:-webkit-zoom-out;background:#333;background:rgba(0,0,0,0)}.featherlight:last-of-type{background:rgba(255,255,255,1)}.featherlight:before{content:'';display:inline-block;height:100%;vertical-align:middle}.featherlight .featherlight-content{position:relative;text-align:left;vertical-align:middle;display:inline-block;overflow:auto;padding:0;border-bottom:none;margin-left:5%;margin-right:5%;max-height:100%;background:#fff;cursor:-moz-zoom-out;cursor:zoom-out;-webkit-cursor:-webkit-zoom-out;white-space:normal}.featherlight .featherlight-inner{display:block}.featherlight link.featherlight-inner,.featherlight script.featherlight-inner,.featherlight style.featherlight-inner{display:none}.featherlight .featherlight-close-icon{position:absolute;z-index:9999;top:0;right:0;line-height:25px;width:25px;cursor:pointer;text-align:center;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;background:#fff;background:rgba(255,255,255,.3);color:#000;border:none;padding:0}.featherlight .featherlight-close-icon::-moz-focus-inner{border:0;padding:0}.featherlight .featherlight-image{width:100%}.featherlight-iframe .featherlight-content{border-bottom:0;padding:0;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;overflow-y:scroll}.featherlight iframe{border:none}.featherlight *{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}}
@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){.featherlight-next,.featherlight-previous{top:10px;right:10px;left:85%}.featherlight-previous{left:10px;right:85%}.featherlight-next span,.featherlight-previous span{margin-top:-30px;font-size:40px}}@media all{.featherlight-next,.featherlight-previous{display:none;position:absolute;top:25px;right:25px;bottom:0;left:80%;cursor:pointer;-webkit-touch-callout:none;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none;background:rgba(0,0,0,0)}.featherlight-previous{left:25px;right:80%}.featherlight-next:hover,.featherlight-previous:hover{background:rgba(255,255,255,.25)}.featherlight-next span,.featherlight-previous span{display:none;position:absolute;top:50%;left:5%;width:82%;text-align:center;font-size:80px;line-height:80px;margin-top:-40px;text-shadow:0 0 5px #fff;color:#fff;font-style:normal;font-weight:400}.featherlight-next span{right:5%;left:auto}.featherlight-first-slide.featherlight-last-slide .featherlight-next,.featherlight-first-slide.featherlight-last-slide .featherlight-previous,.featherlight-loading .featherlight-next,.featherlight-loading .featherlight-previous,.featherlight-next:hover span,.featherlight-previous:hover span,.featherlight-swipe-aware .featherlight-next,.featherlight-swipe-aware .featherlight-previous{display:none}}@media only screen and (max-device-width:1024px){.featherlight-next:hover,.featherlight-previous:hover{background:0 0}.featherlight-next span,.featherlight-previous span{display:none}}
body,p,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,li,ol,ul,embed,i,center,div,figure,figcaption,img,a,b,strong,span,blockquote,nav,article,header,footer,section,button,iframe{margin:0;padding:0;font-size:100%;text-decoration:none}
html{width:100vw}
.siteMapNav li{margin:36px 0 0!important}
body{width:75%;outline:none;margin:0 auto;padding:0 8px;list-style:none;overflow-y:auto;max-width:1200px;overflow-x:hidden;background-color:#ffffff;text-rendering:optimizeLegibility;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-webkit-font-feature-settings:'liga';-moz-font-feature-settings:'liga';font-feature-settings:'liga';-webkit-text-decoration-skip:ink;font-family:'Merriweather',serif;-webkit-font-family:'Merriweather',serif}
h2,h3{line-height:3rem}
header{padding:25px 0 50px}
a,b,p,li,ol,ul,span,strong{outline:none;color:#656c7a;line-height:34px;-webkit-transition:color 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:color 0.25s ease;-o-transition:color 0.25s ease;transition:color 0.25s ease}
h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,footer p{outline:none;color:#656c7a;font-family:'Roboto Slab',Arial,sans-serif;-webkit-font-family:'Roboto Slab',Arial,sans-serif}
figcaption{outline:none;color:#656c7a;font-family:'Roboto Slab',Arial,sans-serif;-webkit-font-family:'Roboto Slab',Arial,sans-serif}
figcaption strong{outline:none;color:#656c7a;font-family:'Roboto Slab',Arial,sans-serif;-webkit-font-family:'Roboto Slab',Arial,sans-serif}
body::-webkit-scrollbar{background-color:#ffffff;width:10px}
body::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background-color:#ffffff}
body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:#babac0;-webkit-border-radius:10px;-moz-border-radius:10px;border-radius:10px;border:2px solid #ffffff}
body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background-color:#a0a0a5}
.blob-wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar{background-color:#ffffff;height:4px}
.blob-wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background-color:#ffffff}
.blob-wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:#babac0;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px}
.blob-wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background-color:#a0a0a5}
img::-moz-selection{visibility:hidden;background:transparent}
img::selection{visibility:hidden;background:transparent}
img::-moz-selection{visibility:hidden;background:transparent}
::-moz-selection{color:#fff;background:#babac0}
::selection{color:#fff;background:#babac0}
::-moz-selection{color:#fff;background:#babac0}
.hrline span::-moz-selection{color:#babac0;background:#fff}
.hrline span::selection{color:#babac0;background:#fff}
.hrline span::-moz-selection{color:#babac0;background:#fff}
.hrline span:hover,.hrline:hover{cursor:default}
.clearfix{clear:both}
.everyTxtEndArticle{max-width:640px;text-align:left;padding-bottom:25px}
.everyTxtEnd{padding:25px 0 100px}
.everyTxtEnd2{padding:50px 0 75px}
.everyTxtEnd3{padding:10px 0 50px}
.everyTxtEndEnd{padding:50px 0 25px}
.everyTxtEnd h2,h3,.everyTxtEnd2 h2,h3,.everyTxtEnd3 h2,h3{font-size:28px;font-size:1.75rem}
#prevNext{padding-top:25px;padding-bottom:50px}
.prevNext .fa{margin:0 4px}
.fa-external-link{margin-left:4px}
.prevNextTop2,.prevNextTop{float:left;color:#babac0}
.prevNextleft{float:left}
.prevNextright{float:right}
#headerLogo{float:left;margin:50px 0}
#headerLogo h1{font-weight:700;line-height:5rem;font-size:40px;font-size:2.5rem}
a span:hover,a b:hover,a:hover{color:#2a2e2e}
#headerLogo h1:hover{color:#2a2e2e}
#headerNav nav{float:right;margin:50px 0;padding-top:25px}
.headerNavList{margin-left:25px;display:inline-block}
.headerNavList:first-child{margin-left:0}
.headerNav{padding-top:1px;padding-bottom:1px;display:inline-block;border-bottom:1px solid transparent}
.headerNav:hover{border-bottom:2px solid #babac0}
.prevNextTop i{margin-right:4px}
.aboutHover a{border-bottom:2px solid #e7e9ee}
.article{width:100%;height:auto;margin:0 auto;padding:2rem 0;display:inline-block;border-top:2px solid #e7e9ee;border-bottom:2px solid #e7e9ee}
#artImgBox div,.flatIconBox{margin:2vw 0 0}
.artImgBoxEach a{display:inline-block;width:33.3333%;margin:0 auto;float:left}
.artImgBoxEach a:nth-child(3n+1){clear:both}
.flatIconBox div{display:inline-block;width:32.8869%}
.artImgBoxEach img,.flatIconBoxEach img{width:90%;margin:0 5%;-webkit-border-radius:8px;-moz-border-radius:8px;border-radius:8px;border:1px solid #f5f5f5}
.profile{width:100%;height:100%;-webkit-border-radius:6px;-moz-border-radius:6px;border-radius:6px}
.artImgBoxEach img:hover{-webkit-transform:translateY(-10px);-khtml-transform:translateY(-10px);-moz-transform:translateY(-10px);-ms-transform:translateY(-10px);-o-transform:translateY(-10px);transform:translateY(-10px);-webkit-box-shadow:0 8px 32px 4px #e7e9ee;-moz-box-shadow:0 8px 24px 4px #e7e9ee;box-shadow:0 8px 24px 4px #e7e9ee}
.artImgBoxEach figcaption{text-align:center;font-weight:lighter;margin-bottom:4vw;margin-top:-.5vw}
.flatIconBoxEach figcaption{text-align:center;font-weight:lighter;margin-bottom:4vw;margin-top:-.5vw}
.artImgBoxEach:hover .text{visibility:visible}
.artImgBoxEach .text{left:0;bottom:30px;position:relative;visibility:hidden}
.artImgBoxEach figure,.artImgBoxEach img,.artImgBoxEach figcaption{-webkit-transition:all 0.5s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.5s ease;-o-transition:all 0.5s ease;transition:all 0.5s ease}
.topUp,.topUp2,.nextRight,.nextRight2,.nextLeft,.nextLeft2{-webkit-transition:transform 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:transform 0.25s ease;-o-transition:transform 0.25s ease;-webkit-transition:-webkit-transform 0.25s ease;transition:-webkit-transform 0.25s ease;-o-transition:-o-transform 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:transform 0.25s ease,-moz-transform 0.25s ease;transition:transform 0.25s ease;transition:transform 0.25s ease,-webkit-transform 0.25s ease,-moz-transform 0.25s ease,-o-transform 0.25s ease}
.topUp{-webkit-transform:translateY(-5px);-khtml-transform:translateY(-5px);-moz-transform:translateY(-5px);-ms-transform:translateY(-5px);-o-transform:translateY(-5px);transform:translateY(-5px)}
.topUp2,.nextRight2,.nextLeft2{-webkit-transform:translateY(0px);-khtml-transform:translateY(0px);-moz-transform:translateY(0px);-ms-transform:translateY(0px);-o-transform:translateY(0px);transform:translateY(0px)}
.nextRight{-webkit-transform:translateX(5px);-khtml-transform:translateX(5px);-moz-transform:translateX(5px);-ms-transform:translateX(5px);-o-transform:translateX(5px);transform:translateX(5px)}
.nextLeft{-webkit-transform:translateX(-5px);-khtml-transform:translateX(-5px);-moz-transform:translateX(-5px);-ms-transform:translateX(-5px);-o-transform:translateX(-5px);transform:translateX(-5px)}
.articleNoTopBorder{border-top:1px solid transparent;border-bottom:2px solid #e7e9ee}
.aboutTxtBox h2,h3{font-size:28px;font-size:1.75rem}
h4{margin:8px 0;display:inline-block;font-size:22px;font-size:1.375rem}
.aboutIntroBox_100_bigbox{width:100%;height:80%;display:block}
.aboutIntroBox_80{width:70%;float:left;padding-right:10%;display:block}
.aboutIntroBox_20{width:20%;float:right;display:block}
.aboutTxtBox p a{-webkit-transition:color 0.5s ease;-moz-transition:color 0.5s ease;-o-transition:color 0.5s ease;transition:color 0.5s ease}
.aboutTxtBox p a:hover{color:#2a2e2e;-webkit-transition:color 0.5s ease;-moz-transition:color 0.5s ease;-o-transition:color 0.5s ease;transition:color 0.5s ease}
.triBox{width:100%;height:auto}
.triBoxMain{margin:0 auto}
.coverImg{width:100%}
.coverImg img{width:100%;padding:25px 0}
.musicHtml{padding-top:1rem}
.musicEachBox{width:100%;margin:0 auto;margin-bottom:80px}
.musicEachBox:last-child{margin-bottom:50px}
.musicEachBox iframe{width:80%;max-width:800px;min-width:240px}
.musicEachBox p{margin:4px 0 0}
.pckIconBox .musicEachBox span,.musicEachBox a{display:inline-block;font-size:13.6px;font-size:0.85rem;line-height:1.4rem}
.pckIconBox .musicEachBox span{margin:0 8px}
.musicEachBox a i{opacity:0.75;filter:alpha(opacity=75)}
.iframe iframe{width:100%;height:100%;min-height:500px;padding:20px 0 25px}
footer{width:100%;height:auto;vertical-align:middle;padding:4rem 0 6rem}
footer p{float:left;font-size:16px;font-size:1rem}
#snsIcon i{top:-4px;float:right;padding:8px;font-size:18px;font-size:1.125rem;margin-left:2px;position:relative;text-align:center}
#snsIcon i:hover{-webkit-transform:translateY(-2.5px);-khtml-transform:translateY(-2.5px);-moz-transform:translateY(-2.5px);-ms-transform:translateY(-2.5px);-o-transform:translateY(-2.5px);transform:translateY(-2.5px)}
#twIcon:hover{color:#1da1f2}
#ghIcon:hover{color:#333}
#liIcon:hover{color:#0077b5}
#fbIcon:hover{color:#3b5998}
#inIcon:hover{color:#e1306c}
#beIcon:hover{color:#1769ff}
#drIcon:hover{color:#ea4c89}
#scIcon:hover{color:#f30}
#medIcon:hover{color:#00ab6c}
#siteMap{width:100%;height:auto;text-align:center;padding:50px 0 4rem;border-bottom:2px solid #e7e9ee}
#siteMap > p{display:inline-block}
.siteMapBtn:hover{cursor:pointer}
.siteMapNav{display:none}
#siteMap li{width:30%;margin:25px 0 0;display:inline-block}
.c-hamburger{margin:0;padding:0;width:40px;height:40px;font-size:0;font-size:0rem;border:none;display:block;cursor:pointer;-moz-box-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;overflow:hidden;position:relative;-webkit-border-radius:none;-moz-border-radius:none;border-radius:none;text-indent:-9999px;-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;-webkit-box-shadow:none;-webkit-transition:background 0.3s;-moz-transition:background 0.3s;-o-transition:background 0.3s;transition:background 0.3s;opacity:0.5;filter:alpha(opacity=50);-webkit-transition:opacity ease 0.5s;-moz-transition:opacity ease 0.5s;-o-transition:opacity ease 0.5s;transition:opacity ease 0.5s}
.c-hamburger:hover{opacity:1;filter:alpha(opacity=100);-webkit-transition:opacity ease 0.5s;-moz-transition:opacity ease 0.5s;-o-transition:opacity ease 0.5s;transition:opacity ease 0.5s}
.c-hamburger:focus{outline:none}
.c-hamburger span{top:25px;display:block;left:5px;right:5px;height:2px;position:absolute;background-color:#babac0}
.c-hamburger span:before,.c-hamburger span:after{left:0;content:"";width:100%;height:2px;display:block;position:absolute;background-color:#babac0}
.c-hamburger span:before{top:-10px}
.c-hamburger span:after{bottom:-10px}
.c-hamburger--htx{background-color:transparent}
.c-hamburger--htx span{-webkit-transition:background 0 0.25s;-moz-transition:background 0 0.25s;-o-transition:background 0 0.25s;transition:background 0 0.25s}
.c-hamburger--htx span:before,.c-hamburger--htx span:after{-webkit-transition-duration:0.25s,0.25s;-moz-transition-duration:0.25s,0.25s;-o-transition-duration:0.25s,0.25s;transition-duration:0.25s,0.25s;-webkit-transition-delay:0s,0s;-moz-transition-delay:0s,0s;-o-transition-delay:0s,0s;transition-delay:0s,0s}
.c-hamburger--htx span:before{-webkit-transition-property:top,transform;-moz-transition-property:top,transform;-o-transition-property:top,transform;-webkit-transition-property:top,-webkit-transform;transition-property:top,-webkit-transform;-o-transition-property:top,-o-transform;-moz-transition-property:top,transform,-moz-transform;transition-property:top,transform;transition-property:top,transform,-webkit-transform,-moz-transform,-o-transform}
.c-hamburger--htx span:after{-webkit-transition-property:bottom,transform;-moz-transition-property:bottom,transform;-o-transition-property:bottom,transform;-webkit-transition-property:bottom,-webkit-transform;transition-property:bottom,-webkit-transform;-o-transition-property:bottom,-o-transform;-moz-transition-property:bottom,transform,-moz-transform;transition-property:bottom,transform;transition-property:bottom,transform,-webkit-transform,-moz-transform,-o-transform}
.c-hamburger--htx.is-active{background-color:transparent}
.c-hamburger--htx.is-active span{background:none}
.c-hamburger--htx.is-active span:before{top:0;-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg);-khtml-transform:rotate(45deg);-moz-transform:rotate(45deg);-ms-transform:rotate(45deg);-o-transform:rotate(45deg);transform:rotate(45deg)}
.c-hamburger--htx.is-active span:after{bottom:0;-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg);-khtml-transform:rotate(-45deg);-moz-transform:rotate(-45deg);-ms-transform:rotate(-45deg);-o-transform:rotate(-45deg);transform:rotate(-45deg)}
.c-hamburger--htx.is-active span:before,.c-hamburger--htx.is-active span:after{-webkit-transition-delay:0s,0.25s;-moz-transition-delay:0s,0.25s;-o-transition-delay:0s,0.25s;transition-delay:0s,0.25s}
.articleImgSize{margin:24px 0;text-align:center}
.articleImg35-small img{width:25%}
.articleImg50-small img{width:50%}
.articleImg30 img{width:30%}
.articleImg35 img{width:35%}
.articleImg50 img{width:50%}
.articleImg75 img{width:75%}
.articleImg img{width:100%}
.articleImg40 img{width:49.5%;display:inline-block}
.topBtn{right:12px;bottom:12px;color:#babac0;position:fixed;font-size:26px;font-size:1.625rem}
.topBtn:hover{color:#656c7a}
#topBtnFixed{opacity:0;filter:alpha(opacity=0)}
#topBtnFixed.show{opacity:1}
.fa-chevron-circle-up{padding:12px}
.code{border:2px solid #e5e5e5;letter-spacing:-.25px;padding:12px 24px 8px;background-color:#f4f4f4;margin:32px 0;color:#66799f!important;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px}
.code::-webkit-scrollbar{background-color:transparent;height:4px;width:0}
.code::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background-color:transparent}
.code::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:#babac0;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px}
.code::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background-color:#a0a0a5}
.codeInline{padding:1px 4px 1px;color:#66799f;border:1px solid #e5e5e5;-webkit-border-radius:2px;-moz-border-radius:2px;border-radius:2px;background-color:#f0f0f0}
.code,.codeInline{font-family:"SFMono-Regular",Consolas,"Liberation Mono",Menlo,Courier,monospace;-webkit-font-family:"SFMono-Regular",Consolas,"Liberation Mono",Menlo,Courier,monospace}
.textbox-colored{padding:16px;background-color:#f4f4f4;margin:24px 0 32px;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px;border:2px solid #e5e5e5}
.textbox-colored li{margin-top:16px;margin-bottom:16px}
.textbox-colored li:first-child{margin-top:8px}
.textbox-colored li:last-child{margin-bottom:8px}
.aboutTxtBox ul{padding:0 16px}
.feather img,.feather figcaption{cursor:-webkit-zoom-in;cursor:-ms-zoom-in;cursor:-o-zoom-in;cursor:-moz-zoom-in;cursor:zoom-in}
.memoree-margin img{margin:50px 0}
.quote{text-align:center;display:inline-block;margin:32px 64px;font-size:24px;font-size:1.5rem;line-height:40px;line-height:2.5rem;font-family:Cambria,"Times New Roman","Merriweather",serif;-webkit-font-family:Cambria,"Times New Roman","Merriweather",serif}
.quoteExcept{margin:32px 56px}
.prototype{background-color:#ffffff;margin:32px 0 64px}
.underline,#prevNext a:hover,.siteMapNav a:hover{-webkit-text-decoration:underline;text-decoration:underline}
.hrline span{color:#babac0!important;font-size:24px;font-size:1.5rem;margin:64px 4px 72px;font-weight:bolder;display:inline-block}
.hrline span:after{content:"ㆍ"}
.colorBox{width:32px;height:8px;margin:-8px 0 12px;background-color:#babac0}
.lineImage{border:2px solid #e5e5e5}
.copy{cursor:url(/img/specialCopyCursor-2lv34.cur),pointer}
.tooltip{visibility:visible;opacity:0;filter:alpha(opacity=0);-webkit-transition:opacity 3s ease;-moz-transition:opacity 3s ease;-o-transition:opacity 3s ease;transition:opacity 3s ease}
.textbox-colored h6{font-size:21px;font-size:1.3125rem;font-style:italic}
.textbox-colored p{margin:0 8px}
.textbox-colored h6{margin:0 16px 4px}
.textbox-colored p:first-child,.textbox-colored h6:first-child{margin-top:8px}
.textbox-colored p:last-child,.textbox-colored h6:last-child{margin-bottom:8px}
/*Gist*/
body .gist{margin:24px 0}
body .gist pre,body .gist td,body .gist tr{font-family:"SFMono-Regular",Consolas,"Liberation Mono",Menlo,Courier,monospace;-webkit-font-family:"SFMono-Regular",Consolas,"Liberation Mono",Menlo,Courier,monospace;font-size:13px;font-size:0.8125rem;line-height:18px!important}
.blob-num,.blob-code,.gist-data,.pl-v,.pl-cce,.pl-c1,.pl-c,.pl-k,.pl-s,.pl-en,.pl-smi,.pl-e,.pl-ent,.pl-pds,.blob-wrapper,.t-body{font-family:"SFMono-Regular",Consolas,"Liberation Mono",Menlo,Courier,monospace;-webkit-font-family:"SFMono-Regular",Consolas,"Liberation Mono",Menlo,Courier,monospace;font-size:13px;font-size:0.8125rem;line-height:18px!important}
.gist-data{padding:8px 0}
.gist-meta{display:none}
.gist-data,.gist{border-bottom:0 solid transparent!important;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px}
.everyTxtEnd,.everyTxtEndArticle{padding-top:2.5rem}
.whiteBgImg,.gist-file{border:1px solid #e5e5e5!important;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px}
.prevNextTop,.prevNextTop2{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.prevNextTop:hover,.prevNextTop2:hover{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
a:hover,#topBtnFixed{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.prevNext,#headerLogo h1{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.prevNext:hover,#headerLogo h1:hover{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.topBtn{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.topBtn:hover{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.headerNav,#snsIcon i,#siteMap a{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.headerNav:hover,#snsIcon i:hover,#siteMap a:hover{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
.artImgBoxEach img:hover,#headerNav li{-webkit-transition:all 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:all 0.25s ease;-o-transition:all 0.25s ease;transition:all 0.25s ease}
figcaption{opacity:0.9;filter:alpha(opacity=90);margin:0 auto;display:block;font-size:14px;font-size:0.875rem;max-width:640px;line-height:26px;font-style:italic}
ul > li{list-style-type:disc}
li{margin-left:24px}
ol{margin:0 0 1.5em;padding:0;counter-reset:item}
ol > li{margin:0;padding:0 0 0 1.4em;text-indent:-1.35em;list-style-type:none;counter-increment:item}
ol > li:before{display:inline-block;width:1em;padding-right:0.075rem;font-weight:bolder;text-align:right;content:counter(item) "."}
#codeBySpemer{line-height:26px!important}
.pckIconBox{margin-top:2vw}
.triBoxMain iframe{margin:1.62vw 0 0}
img[data-src]{max-width:480px;display:block;margin:auto}
figcaption h3{font-weight:400;font-size:16px;font-size:1rem;margin:-16px 0;font-style:normal}
.atechImg{width:100%;height:100%;margin:0;padding:0}
@media only screen and (max-width:768px){.everyTxtEndArticle{max-width:560px}.artImgBoxEach a{width:50%}.artImgBoxEach a:nth-child(3n+1){clear:none}.artImgBoxEach a:nth-child(2n+1){clear:both}.flatIconBox div{width:49%}.aboutIntroBox_OVERALL,.aboutIntroBox_80{width:100%;margin:0 auto;display:block}.aboutIntroBox_20{width:50%;float:left;display:block;margin:0 auto}.aboutIntroBox_20 img{margin:24px 0}body{width:90%}#headerNav nav{float:right;margin:25px 0;padding-top:50px}.headerNavList{margin-left:15px;display:inline-block}.headerNavList:first-child{margin-left:0}.iframe iframe{width:100%;height:50%;max-height:350px;min-height:250px;padding:25px 0;margin-bottom:25px}#topBtnFixed{display:none}}
@media only screen and (max-width:420px){#headerLogo h1{font-size:36px;font-size:2.25rem;margin:15px 0 -15px}header{width:100%;padding:0;text-align:center}header div{clear:both}.textbox-colored{padding:8px 16px 8px 8px}.quote{margin:32px 0;font-size:20px;font-size:1.25rem;line-height:32px}}
@media screen and (max-width:224px){.flatIconBox div{width:100%}}
@media only screen and (max-width:420px){.artImgBoxEach img,.flatIconBoxEach img{margin-top:2vw;margin-bottom:2vw;-webkit-border-radius:4px;-moz-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px}.profile{width:75%;height:75%}/*.artImgBoxEach figcaption,*/.flatIconBoxEach figcaption{display:none}.artImgBoxEach figcaption h3{font-size:12px;line-height:1.6;padding: 0 10px}.aboutIntroBox_20{width:100%;margin:0 auto;display:block}.aboutIntroBox_80{padding-right:5%}#siteMap li{width:40%}.articleImg35 img,.articleImg50-small img{width:100%}.articleImg35-small img{width:60%}.code{padding:8px 16px}.hrline span{margin:64px 4px}.xdiframe{display:none}}
@media screen and (max-width:433px){.musicEachBox p{margin:4px 0 8px;line-height:1.6rem}}
@media screen and (max-width:380px){.pckIconBox .musicEachBox span{display:none}}
@media screen and (min-width:701px){#snsIcon{margin-right:-8px}}
@media only screen and (max-width:600px){#headerNav nav{display:block;left:50%;right:50%;position:relative;margin:0 auto!important;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-khtml-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-moz-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-o-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}#headerLogo{display:block;left:50%;right:50%;position:relative;margin:0 auto!important;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-khtml-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-moz-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-o-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);transform:translate(-50%,-50%);margin-top:3rem!important}#headerNav nav{width:100%;text-align:center;margin-top:-1rem!important}}
@media screen and (max-width:700px){#snsIcon{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:-webkit-flex;display:-moz-box;display:flex;-webkit-box-orient:horizontal;-webkit-box-direction:reverse;-ms-flex-direction:row-reverse;-webkit-flex-direction:row-reverse;-moz-box-orient:horizontal;-moz-box-direction:reverse;flex-direction:row-reverse;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;-webkit-justify-content:center;-moz-box-pack:center;justify-content:center}#snsIcon a{margin:4px .25vw -2rem}footer{width:100%;margin:0 auto}footer div{clear:both}footer div p{width:100%;margin:auto;display:block;position:relative;text-align:center;padding:0 0 10px}}
@media screen and (max-width:767px){.articleImg40 img,.articleImg75 img,.articleImg50 img{width:100%}.articleImg35 img,.articleImg50-small img{width:60%}.articleImg35-small img{width:45%}}
@media only screen and (max-width:768px){.quote{margin:32px;font-size:22px;font-size:1.375rem;line-height:36px}.prototype{display:none}}
a:link{color:$(link.color);text-decoration:none;margin:0;-webkit-transition:ease-in-out .2s;-moz-transition:ease-in-out .2s;-ms-transition:ease-in-out .2s;-o-transition:ease-in-out .2s;transition:ease-in-out .2s}
a:visited{color:$(link.color.visited)}
a:hover{color:$(link.color.hover)}	
.post-body{outline:none;color:#656c7a;line-height:34px;-webkit-transition:color 0.25s ease;-moz-transition:color 0.25s ease;-o-transition:color 0.25s ease;transition:color 0.25s ease}
.post-body img{max-width:100%;height:auto}
.post-body a.img,.post-body .separator a{margin-left:0!important;margin-right:0!important}
table{width:100%}
table th{color:#4285f4;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-size:18px}
table td{border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12);text-align:left;vertical-align:top}
table caption{border:none;font-style:italic}
th{font-weight:700}
td,th{padding:8px;line-height:1.42857143;vertical-align:top;text-align:left;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.12)}
table.striped tr:nth-child(even) >td{background-color:#f2f2f2}
table.dark tr,table.dark th{background-color:#212529;color:#fff}
table.dark.striped tr:nth-child(even) > td,table.dark.striped tr > th{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.05)}
table.tr-caption-container{width:auto}
table.tr-caption-container td{padding:8px;background:#fff!important}
table.tr-caption-container td a{margin:0!important}
code,pre{font-family:Menlo,Monaco,Consolas,"Courier New",monospace;font-size:16px;color:rgba(0,0,0,.8)}
pre{background:#efefef;margin:16px 0;white-space:pre-wrap;margin:10px 0;padding:10px 15px;border:1px solid #ddd}
code{line-height:inherit;word-break:break-all;word-wrap:break-word}
blockquote{border-left:2px solid #2196f3;font-family:Georgia,Times,"Times New Roman",serif;margin:16px 0;padding-left:16px}
#linkloadmore{display:block;text-align:center;padding-top:20px;}
